img_text: Hungarian Border Wall: "Illegals Don't Even TRY to cross it" f y G. m WORLD | NEWS DESK : 05 APRIL 2019 1 HITS: 543 1 Comment Skeptics who believe a border wall will not stop illegals from entering the United States may want to look at what's happening in Hungary. On the day its border fence was completed, the influx of illegals entering Hungary went down from 6,353 per day to 870 the next. For the remainder of that month, illegal border crossings were steadily below 40 per day, officials said They don't even try, a local border guard said.
